original_text: “This is what the Lord says: ‘Out of your own household I am going to bring calamity on you. Before your very eyes I will take your wives and give them to one who is close to you, and he will sleep with your wives in broad daylight.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 이와 같이 이르시기를 보라 내가 너와 네 집에 재앙을 일으키고 내가 네 눈앞에서 네 아내를 빼앗아 네 이웃들에게 주리니 그 사람들이 네 아내들과 더불어 백주에 동침하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
I am going to bring calamity on you
and give them to one who is close to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 너와 가까운 한 사람에게 주리라

sentences.original_text: and he will sleep with your wives
